name: Discombobulated 2023
description:
Our game, Discombobulated is about a game where you are a cat trying to
get out of a haunted mansion with three ghosts in it. Solve puzzles by
maneuvering objects and inputting pass Don't forget about the story
and have fun!
Ryan, Rai, Jeremy, Romain, Daphne
Controls: W,A,S,D, and Left Click for Buttons
